backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, game modes, best scores, access control, and exposes query/mutation methods for saving and retrieving player data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping product requirements to frontend file implementations with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend source files and their roles across pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with routes for the Metablocks hub, game modes, puzzle pages, and leaderboard within the AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides shared layout with Metablocks header, navigation, coin display, auth status, and footer wrapping all pages.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Displays Internet Identity login state, sign-in/out controls, and principal info via dropdown.
frontend/src/components/ModeTile.tsx: Reusable tile component showing a game mode’s icon, description, and optional best score with click navigation.
frontend/src/components/RequireSignInDia: Modal prompting users to sign in before saving puzzle best scores, integrated with Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBattle.ts: Fetches battle stats and provides a mutation to record a battle win using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCarRacing.ts: Loads the user's best car racing time and saves new times through game session calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useCityBuilder.ts: Provides functions to save and load city layout data, calling simplified backend update operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useFarming.ts: Handles saving farm plot states, harvesting, and loading stored farming data via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameProgress.ts: Saves generic game progress by starting, updating, and ending a backend game session.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an identity provider using Internet Identity, exposing login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerProfile.ts: Fetches the current player's profile from the backend when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/usePuzzleBestScores.t: Saves best puzzle scores through game session calls and exposes saving state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HubPage.tsx: Renders the main hub with game mode tiles, loading user best scores and handling navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays leaderboards for multiple game modes using tabs and mock data, showing ranks, players, and scores.
frontend/src/pages/modes/BattlePage.tsx: Implements a turn‑based battle system with player/enemy actions, HP tracking, win/loss states, and saving win stats.
frontend/src/pages/modes/CarPage.tsx: Runs a car‑racing minigame with lane movement, time tracking, progress animation, and saving best race times.
frontend/src/pages/modes/CityBuilderPage: Provides a grid‑based city builder where players place structures using coins, persisting the grid state to backend storage.
Implements an endless runner with jumping, obstacle spawning, score tracking, collision detection, and saving progress.
frontend/src/pages/modes/FarmingPage.tsx: Manages a farming grid where crops grow over time, allowing planting, harvesting for coins, and saving/loading farm state.
frontend/src/pages/modes/indoor/PuzzleGa: Implements an 8‑tile sliding puzzle with move tracking, win detection, scoring, and progress saving.
frontend/src/pages/modes/indoor/Reaction: Implements a reaction‑time game with timed rounds, scoring, and saving progress.
frontend/src/pages/modes/IndoorPage.tsx: Provides a menu for indoor games and switches between ReactionGame and PuzzleGame subpages.
frontend/src/pages/puzzles/LightsOutPage: Implements a 5x5 Lights Out puzzle with random initialization, move counting, completion scoring, and optional score saving.
frontend/src/pages/puzzles/MemoryMatchPa: Implements a memory matching game with flipped cards, match detection, scoring, and optional score saving.
frontend/src/pages/puzzles/SlidingTilesP: Implements a 3x3 sliding tiles puzzle with random shuffling, move handling, solve detection, and score saving.
frontend/src/pages/puzzles/SudokuMiniPag: Implements a 4x4 Sudoku mini‑game with puzzle generation, mistake tracking, completion scoring, and optional score saving for signed‑in users.
frontend/src/pages/puzzles/WordScrambleP: Provides a word‑scramble game that randomizes words, tracks attempts, handles success/failure, and saves scores for signed‑in users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash‑based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, assets, and architectural notes for the PS PUZZLE game.
